**矮人圆盾**（dwarvish roundshield）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[盾牌](/wiki/%E7%9B%BE%E7%89%8C "盾牌")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它由[铁](/index.php?title=%E9%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "铁 (page does not exist)")制成，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观为**大圆盾**（large round shield）。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)

- [5 Variants](#Variants)

  - [5.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [5.2 SporkHack](#SporkHack)
  - [5.3 UnNetHack](#UnNetHack)
  - [5.4 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [5.5 EvilHack](#EvilHack)

- [6 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

[矮人](/index.php?title=%E7%9F%AE%E4%BA%BA%EF%BC%88%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%A7%8D%E6%97%8F%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "矮人（起始种族） (page does not exist)")族的角色在游戏开始时即鉴定矮人圆盾。

非[亡灵](/index.php?title=%E4%BA%A1%E7%81%B5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "亡灵 (page does not exist)")的[矮人](/index.php?title=%E7%9F%AE%E4%BA%BA%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E5%B1%9E%E6%80%A7%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "矮人（怪物属性） (page does not exist)")族怪物在生成时若会[获得](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")[矮人短剑](/wiki/%E7%9F%AE%E4%BA%BA%E7%9F%AD%E5%89%91 "矮人短剑")和[矮人铁头盔](/wiki/%E7%9F%AE%E4%BA%BA%E9%93%81%E5%A4%B4%E7%9B%94 "矮人铁头盔")，则有1⁄2的概率获得一面矮人圆盾[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

## 描述

矮人圆盾的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为2。

## 策略

- *主条目：[盾牌#策略](/wiki/%E7%9B%BE%E7%89%8C#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5 "盾牌")*

矮人圆盾是游戏前期最容易获取的2 AC加成的盾牌，其在[侏儒矿坑](/index.php?title=%E4%BE%8F%E5%84%92%E7%9F%BF%E5%9D%91\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "侏儒矿坑 (page does not exist)")中较为常见。它很重，而且没有特殊加成，但至少可以在你找到更轻或更好的盾牌之前提供不错的防御加成。

## 历史

矮人圆盾最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Dwarvish_roundshield/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

Some variants may give dwarves (including dwarven characters) an AC bonus for wearing a dwarvish roundshield.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") a dwarvish roundshield will produce a [large shield](/wiki/Large_shield "Large shield") and vice versa.

### SporkHack

In [SporkHack](/wiki/SporkHack "SporkHack"), the dwarvish roundshield grants +1 AC to dwarves that wear them, including dwarven characters.

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), the dwarvish roundshield grants +1 AC to dwarves that wear them, including dwarven characters.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), the dwarvish roundshield grants 3 AC, 0 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") and [MC](/wiki/MC "MC")1 while worn, and its weight is reduced to 80 [aum](/wiki/Aum "Aum").

Both variants also include a standard [roundshield](/wiki/Roundshield "Roundshield") that shares the unidentified appearance of a "round shield" with the dwarvish roundshield, whose appearance is changed since items can occur in various sizes corresponding to the size of monsters (e.g. a roundshield can be "large", "tiny" or "huge").

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), the dwarvish roundshield grants +1 AC to dwarves that wear them, including dwarven characters.

A dwarvish roundshield can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining a [dwarvish helm](/wiki/Dwarvish_helm "Dwarvish helm") and a [large shield](/wiki/Large_shield "Large shield"); a dwarvish roundshield can be combined with [chain mail](/wiki/Chain_mail "Chain mail") to create [dwarvish chain mail](/wiki/Dwarvish_chain_mail "Dwarvish chain mail").

[Ashmar](/wiki/Ashmar "Ashmar") is an unaligned [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") dwarvish roundshield made of [mithril](/wiki/Mithril "Mithril") that can only be created at a forge by combining the [artifact weapons](/wiki/Artifact_weapon "Artifact weapon") [Ogresmasher](/wiki/Ogresmasher "Ogresmasher") and [Trollsbane](/wiki/Trollsbane "Trollsbane"). While worn, it confers [half physical damage](/wiki/Half_physical_damage "Half physical damage"), hungerless [regeneration](/wiki/Regeneration "Regeneration"), [acid resistance](/wiki/Acid_resistance "Acid resistance"), and extrinsic [protection](/wiki/Protection "Protection") - it also sets the player's [constitution](/wiki/Constitution "Constitution") to 25, and [prevents the wearer from being knocked backwards](/index.php?title=Steadfast\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Steadfast (page does not exist)"). Additionally, if Ashmar deflects an attack, it has a 1⁄4 chance of knocking the attacker back.

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), the dwarvish roundshield grants +1 AC to dwarves that wear them, including dwarven characters.

Upgrading a dwarvish roundshield will produce an [orcish shield](/wiki/Orcish_shield "Orcish shield"), and vice versa. Forging recipes are the same as in EvilHack.

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 372](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L372)

矮人圆盾（dwarvish roundshield）是NetHack中的一种盾牌类防具。它由铁制成，未鉴定时外观为大圆盾（large round shield）。

生成

矮人族的角色在游戏开始时即鉴定矮人圆盾。

非亡灵的矮人族怪物在生成时若会获得矮人短剑和矮人铁头盔，则有1⁄2的概率获得一面矮人圆盾[1]。

描述

矮人圆盾的基础AC加成为2。

策略

主条目：盾牌#策略

矮人圆盾是游戏前期最容易获取的2 AC加成的盾牌，其在侏儒矿坑中较为常见。它很重，而且没有特殊加成，但至少可以在你找到更轻或更好的盾牌之前提供不错的防御加成。

历史

矮人圆盾最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。

Variants

Some variants may give dwarves (including dwarven characters) an AC bonus for wearing a dwarvish roundshield.

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, upgrading a dwarvish roundshield will produce a large shield and vice versa.

SporkHack

In SporkHack, the dwarvish roundshield grants +1 AC to dwarves that wear them, including dwarven characters.

UnNetHack

In UnNetHack, the dwarvish roundshield grants +1 AC to dwarves that wear them, including dwarven characters.

dNetHack

In dNetHack and notdNetHack, the dwarvish roundshield grants 3 AC, 0 DR and MC1 while worn, and its weight is reduced to 80 aum.

Both variants also include a standard roundshield that shares the unidentified appearance of a "round shield" with the dwarvish roundshield, whose appearance is changed since items can occur in various sizes corresponding to the size of monsters (e.g. a roundshield can be "large", "tiny" or "huge").

EvilHack

In EvilHack, the dwarvish roundshield grants +1 AC to dwarves that wear them, including dwarven characters.

A dwarvish roundshield can be created at a forge by combining a dwarvish helm and a large shield; a dwarvish roundshield can be combined with chain mail to create dwarvish chain mail.

Ashmar is an unaligned artifact dwarvish roundshield made of mithril that can only be created at a forge by combining the artifact weapons Ogresmasher and Trollsbane. While worn, it confers half physical damage, hungerless regeneration, acid resistance, and extrinsic protection - it also sets the player's constitution to 25, and prevents the wearer from being knocked backwards. Additionally, if Ashmar deflects an attack, it has a 1⁄4 chance of knocking the attacker back.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, the dwarvish roundshield grants +1 AC to dwarves that wear them, including dwarven characters.

Upgrading a dwarvish roundshield will produce an orcish shield, and vice versa. Forging recipes are the same as in EvilHack.
